titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WOMEN WITH CANCER TOTAL - Description

div.p: WOMEN WITH CANCER TOTAL is the number of women with a proven diagnosis of breast cancer.

WOMEN WITH CANCER TOTAL is derived by counting all women with a proven diagnosis of cancer (OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY NOT REFERRED FOR OPEN BIOPSY CANCER TOTAL and OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING OPEN BIOPSY CANCER DIAGNOSED TOTAL).
